        About this item

        • For straight, easy handling: A hair care brand that helps to straighten hair distortion (includes ribs, and hair) and leads to straightforward hair that is easy to handle. Beautiful and positive living like sunflower for every woman Dear Beauté HIMAWARI
        • What is hair distortion? Hair changes in their 30s start to feel like "hair is pinched and "easy to get bone" due to the disruption of fat and moisture balance between the inside and outside of the hair. Premium Sunflower Oil EX*" formulated in Diabote HIMAWARI helps to balance these balances and care for hair distortion that can cause ribbing, dull, and peask. * Organic sunflower oil, sunflower seed extract, sunflower flower extract
        • Rich & Repair Series: Reduces spread for moist hair. Restores the hair from moisture and makes it easy to handle on rainy days
        • (Skin-friendly formula) Amino acid shampoo formulated with a non-silicone formula & 3 types of amino acids based cleaning ingredients*.         Product description

        Product Description

        Reduces spread for moist hair. A non-silicone hair care brand that corrects hair distortion and leads to straightforward hair that is easy to handle.

        Ingredients

        Water, Sodium Cocoyl Methyltaurine, Palm Nuclear Fatty Acid Amidopropyl Betaine, Cocamide MethylMEA, Cocoyl Glutamate, 2NA Lauroid Salcosine TEA, Cocamide MEA, Glycol, Gysteearate, 2NA Coconut Glutamate, Palm Fatty Acid PEG-7 Glyceryl, Sunflower Seed Oil, Sace, Sunflower Seed Oil Fermentation extract, chicken Mawari Seed Extract, Sunflower Flower Extract, Polyquaterium-7, Sodium Chloride, Ethanol, Mystine Acid, Sodium Cocoyl Treonine, Guarhydopropyl Trimonium Chloride, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Citric Acid, Polyquotanium-10, Polyquotanium-49, BG, Glycerine, EDTA-2Na, Safe Sodium aromatic, fragrance , Caramel

        From the Manufacturer

        Formulated with premium sunflower oil EX, which is concentrated with nutritious sunflower extract.

        Balances the interior and exterior lipids and moisture and leads to easy handling hair.

        Changes in hair such as ribbing, flesh and shedding are caused by the disruption of fat and moisture balance between the inside and outside of the hair, and the so-called "hair distortion".

        No More Blocking Hair

        "Previously shampoo conditioner is not suitable."

        The hair is stronger in the wave.

        The cause of hair problems that you feel from the late 30s may be "warping" of your hair.

        Dear Beauté HIMAWARI employs a "warp care system" that approaches the inside and surface of the hair and leads to easy handling hair.Even if you don't hear what you say, it will lead to straightforward hair.

        ✔ Non-silicone formula

        ✔ 4 types of amino acid cleaning ingredients *1

        ✔ Salphate Free Formula *2

        1 Sodium cocoyl methyltaurine, TEA cocoyl glutamate, lauroid salcosine TEA, sodium cocoyl treonine

        2 No sulfuric acid based surfactant
